title: Test
yAxis: Inflation rate compared to previous year
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 41 data points.
Overall Inflation rate compared to previous year has decreased over the Year.

Inflation rate compared to previous year is roughly constant from 1984 to 1985, slightly increasing from 1985 to 1986, roughly constant from 1986 to 1990, rapidly increasing from 1990 to 1992, roughly constant from 1992 to 1993, rapidly increasing from 1993 to 1994, roughly constant from 1994 to 1995, roughly increasing from 1995 to 1997, roughly constant from 1997 to 1998, roughly increasing from 1998 to 2000, roughly constant from 2000 to 2004, slightly increasing from 2004 to 2005, roughly constant from 2005 to 2007, slightly increasing from 2007 to 2008, roughly constant from 2008 to 2010, roughly increasing from 2010 to 2012, slightly decreasing from 2012 to 2013, roughly increasing from 2013 to 2015, roughly constant from 2015 to 2018, slightly increasing from 2018 to 2019, and lastly roughly constant from 2019 to 2024.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 1993 and 1994.
Max Inflation rate compared to previous year about 25.96 was recorded at Year 1994
Min Inflation rate compared to previous year about 0.42 was recorded at Year 2018
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Inflation rate compared to previous year, with a total of 41 data points. The chart has 7 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2018 to 2024.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 1997 to 2003.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2013 to 2018.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2008 to 2013.
Conversely, the next significant trend is extremely decreasing which exists from 2003 to 2008.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 1992 to 1997.
On the contrary, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 1987 to 1992.
